about.title: Buy and sell Bitcoin without bureaucracy, with total freedom
titles: Buy and sell Bitcoin without bureaucracy, with total freedom
The freedom to negotiate, the security of always
paragraphs: At Alfred, we believe that financial freedom should be simple and accessible to everyone. That's why we offer a P2P (peer-to-peer) platform where you can buy and sell Bitcoin directly, without the need for identity verification processes (KYC). Here, privacy and autonomy are respected in every transaction.

We understand that everyone has the right to manage their resources discreetly and without interference. By choosing Alfred, you're selecting a service where your identity and personal data are not required. Our operating model is based on trust between buyers and sellers, creating an environment where everyone can negotiate securely without compromising their privacy.

Although we don't require KYC, we don't compromise on security. Our platform offers a robust verification and monitoring system to ensure all transactions are legitimate and secure. Each seller is responsible for ensuring the quality of the Bitcoin being traded, and our team is always available to resolve any issues, ensuring that all parties involved in the transaction fulfill their responsibilities.

Forget about long queues for verification and excessive paperwork. At Alfred, transactions are fast, simple, and transparent. With no intermediaries, you deal directly with the other party, without losing the necessary security to ensure everything goes smoothly.

We understand that, operating without KYC, customer support becomes essential. Our support team is always available to resolve any issues, mediate disputes, and ensure that your buying and selling experience is smooth and risk-free. If something doesn't go as expected, our dispute resolution structure is ready to act and protect the interests of our users.

With Alfred, you have the opportunity to be part of a community that values financial freedom and privacy without sacrificing security. We believe in a fairer market where trust is the cornerstone of transactions. Join us and experience true freedom when trading Bitcoin.

fees.reflectionTitle: Reflection: Bitcoin as a Libertarian Tool
fees.reflection1: If Bitcoin is truly a libertarian tool, why do governments still allow individuals to buy BTC legally?
fees.reflection2: The answer lies in how conventional Bitcoin purchases work: to acquire BTC through traditional exchanges, you must provide all your personal data, the well-known KYC (Know Your Customer). This way, the government has access to all information about your transaction, including where your Bitcoin is and who owns it.
fees.reflection3: Although you pay a small transaction fee, the real cost comes at the time of withdrawal. In addition to the fixed withdrawal fee, your transactions are exposed to government control. And the price of this exposure can be high: taxes of up to 27.5% may apply, depending on your location and prevailing regulations.
fees.reflection4: The 'convenience' of conventional exchanges can be much more expensive than you imagine. Moreover, by handing over your personal data, you never know how it may be used or manipulated in the future.
fees.privacy1: It's simple: by choosing Alfred, you ensure your privacy and anonymity.
fees.privacy2: Here, you can start trading from 200 BRL using the Liquid, on-chain, and Lightning networks.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.platformDescription:
Alfred is a P2P (peer-to-peer) platform that offers a secure environment for trading Bitcoin (BTC). Unlike traditional exchanges, Alfred does not have instant transactions. The P2P model ensures that you trade directly with other users , whether as a liquidity provider or an order creator, always with the assurance that transactions will be carried out efficiently and reliably.

All liquidity providers on Alfred make a deposit in BTC, which is retained until the completion of the transaction, ensuring that both parties comply with what was agreed.
transactionsSteps: Choose the desired amount, select the network, and provide your wallet address.
Provide a phone number for sending the payment receipt.
Remember to accept the Terms of Use and applicable fees to proceed.
termsOfUse.transactionLimitsDescription: The minimum amount for the first purchase is R$ 500. The maximum daily transaction limit is R$ 5,000. For amounts above this limit, please contact support for more information and approval.
termsOfUse.transactionDurationDescription: The processing time for a transaction can vary between 30 minutes and 24 hours, depending on several factors, such as banking processing, sending receipts and network congestion. If the market fluctuates during trading, additional delays may occur.
termsOfUse.transactionLimitsPolicyTitle: Transaction Limits and Limit Increase Policy
termsOfUse.transactionLimitsPolicyDescription:
The AlfredP2P platform operates with a progressive transaction limit system, aiming to ensure a secure, gradual experience that complies with market best practices and guidelines for preventing illicit activities.

Currently, the standard limits for users operating directly through the platform are as follows:

Transaction limit: R$5,000 (five thousand Brazilian reais)

Daily limit: R$6,000 (six thousand Brazilian reais)

These values were defined considering the balance between agility and security, especially for new users who are starting their Bitcoin buying and selling operations through our environment.

As the user progresses in their relationship with Alfred—demonstrating regularity, reliability, and a history of successful transactions—it is possible to increase these limits in a personalized way, according to internal risk analysis criteria and profile verification.

However, it is important to highlight that the limit increase process follows a specific flow, different from the platform's automated flow. For this reason, to request an expansion of the allowed values per transaction or per day, the user must contact Alfred's support team. Our team is prepared to guide you on the evaluation criteria, necessary documentation, and other steps that make up this process.

We reinforce our commitment to transparency, security, and close service to each user. The customization of limits is an important tool that allows us to serve users with different profiles and needs, without compromising the integrity of the platform or the principles that govern responsible action in the crypto asset market.

If you are interested in expanding your operational limits, please contact our support through the official channels informed on our platform. It will be a pleasure to accompany you on your journey with Alfred.
termsOfUse.kycPoliciesDescription:
At Alfred, we do not require KYC (Know Your Customer) to carry out transactions, as we believe in the privacy and freedom of our users. The responsibility for identity verification lies with the banks that allow the use of bank accounts.

Our role is to ensure that transactions occur efficiently and securely, functioning as a marketplace for the exchange of values between users.
termsOfUse.globalReachDescription1: Operations are conducted globally, offering various payment options.
termsOfUse.globalReachDescription2: Providers operate independently, without specific ties to banks or regulatory entities.
termsOfUse.globalReachDescription3: Using the platform automatically implies full acceptance of the Terms of Use.
termsOfUse.disputesStep1: Open a support request or contact us via WhatsApp.
termsOfUse.disputesStep2: Financial penalties will be applied in cases of dishonesty.
termsOfUse.disputesStep3: Baseless disputes will be subject to penalties of 10% of the order value.
termsOfUse.disputesStep4: The normal resolution time can range from 7 to 30 days, potentially extending depending on the banks' analysis time.
termsOfUse.conductDescription1: Our commitment is to maintain a safe and respectful environment, aligned with the libertarian principles of Bitcoin.
termsOfUse.conductPenalty1: 10%: Defamation without prior attempt at resolution.
termsOfUse.conductPenalty3: 100%: Fraud attempts or trading with illicit funds.
termsOfUse.conductPenalty4: 125%: Bad faith by the provider or failure to send funds to the counterparty after receipt.
termsOfUse.conductDescription2: Users with inappropriate behavior will be permanently banned.
termsOfUse.footer: Thank you for choosing our platform. Our commitment is to your freedom and privacy.
